channel.title: Error Connecting help
channel.description: I have downloaded Galkons Anarchy v1.5 and I get my no-ip running and i compile with no errors (just says press any key to continue). When I click run and type in everything then click run it says error connecting :eek: . What is the problem. I hear something about you gotta to have a file call "Run.bat" and "runserver.bat" but i dont have "runserver.bat". If you can help me thank you :D. Also where can I get "runserver" :confused: (is it seperate,Where can i get, can i make it)? Once again thank you.

item.title: Error Connecting help
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

I think Galkons Anarchy is a client…Right? Lol. You need a SERVER source…and you need to portforward its actually kind of complicated.

Read full topic
